headline: Suddenly the Dow Is Down. Blame Healthcare Stocks.
summary: There goes the Dow's daily gain.  The S&P 500 was still up 0.1%, while the Nasdaq Composite was on track for a record close with a 0.6% gain.  Tech was the day’s biggest winner, and that sector has less pull on the Dow than the other big indexes.

headline: Honeywell illegally forced US worker in China to retire, lawsuit alleges
summary: The employee said the company violated the ADEA when it fired her based on a “blatantly wrong” interpretation of China’s mandatory retirement law.

raw.headline: Honeywell illegally forced US worker in China to retire, lawsuit alleges

headline: Ensurge Micropower ASA appoints Shauna McIntyre as new CEO to lead commercial scale-up
summary: Oslo, August 7, 2025 – Ensurge Micropower ASA (“Ensurge” or the “Company”), a developer of solid-state microbatteries, has appointed Shauna McIntyre as its new CEO. She will assume the role on or about September 1, 2025, bringing more than 25 years of leadership experience in the energy, technology, and industrial sectors. Ms. McIntyre most recently served as Deputy CEO at battery producer Northvolt and has previously held senior leadership roles at companies including Google, Honeywell, and Sen
